description: Main application entry point for the educational content management system's front-end. Sets up client-side routing, authentication context, theming, and access control for various pages and user roles.

classes.name: AdminRoute
classes.description: A route guard component that restricts access to admin users and displays an unauthorized message or redirects

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application component that sets theme variables and defines the routing structure for the app

methods.name: AdminRoute({ children })
methods.description: React functional component implementing admin-only route guard, rendering children if user role is admin; otherwise shows unauthorized message.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: React functional component serving as the main app container, setting theme variables on load, and defining all application routes with role-based protections.
